name: flabbergastingly

in a shocking way that is usually unexpected: She has produced one of the most flabbergastingly beautiful pieces of work that I have ever seen. Quite flabbergastingly, at the same time as redundancies were announced, the news came out that the CEO had given himself a huge pay rise.
